Used technologies

  • PHP 7
  • MySQL 5.7
  • Laravel 5.2
  • Bootstrap 4 Alpha
  • Laravel Elixir, node, npm, gulp for building css/js/svg
  • SASS
  • ECMAScript 6 with Babel and Rollup.js
  • BunnyJS - lightweight ES6 library
  • HTML template engine - Laravel's Blade
  • ORM - Laravel's query builder and Eloquent
